name: Muddy Wheels
description:
Muddy Wheels is a game I made to help me learn Unity and the

Playmaker action system. Intended for mobile platforms, you

must steer a car along a dirt road steering it from left to

right by pressing any key to change directions or clicking the

mouse.                                                        

-----------------------------------------------------------------

How to install:

Just pull the folder out of the zip file to anywhere on your

computer and run the executable.
